title: One County Access
content: Weekly surplus fund leads from one Florida county.

services.item: Weekly CSV delivery of new surplus cases
Owner names, mailing addresses, and parcel info
Surplus balances, legal descriptions, sale dates

title: Three County Access
content: Track surplus leads in up to three Florida counties of your choice.

services.item: Monitor any three counties we support
Priority delivery of CSVs and document bundles
Custom ZIP package for offline delivery
Easily upgrade to full access anytime

title: Pro Access: All Counties
content: Full access to all supported Florida counties, filters, and upcoming dashboard tools.

services.item: Access to all current and future counties
Custom CSV reports and grouped PDFs
